text: Today on the West Coast, it's a solid 7 ft @ 14s WNW with a light 12 mph S wind. Ardnave Bay and Saligo Bay are your best bets, offering clean conditions throughout the day. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 3 ft @ 10s WSW, still workable but with a fresh 15 mph S wind. Day after, expect 4 ft @ 10s W, but fresh onshore will make it messy. Best: today.
